DOC.brief_title: Periimplant Mucosa Dynamics Around Divergent Concave Atlantis Abutment Transition Profiles
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , prospective , control clinical trial compare facial gingival profile around Atlantis™ abutment either linear `` divergent '' `` concave '' transitional profile facial proximal aspect abutment . Sixty study subject require replacement single-rooted tooth implant-supported restoration recruit . The Osseospeed™ Plus implant place 60 subject , use Uni healing abutment minimize lateral tissue displacement healing . After implant placement , final impression obtain ( 8 week post-placement ) , subject randomize either `` divergent '' `` concave '' transmucosal abutment design . For fabrication experimental abutment , Atlantis™ engineer initially design control `` divergent '' prototype modify concavity facial proximal transition zone obtain abutment otherwise retain feature control abutment . Engineers measure linear topographical change ( ΔL=Lc-Ld ) transition zone , well volumetric change ( x ) mid-facial aspect abutment induce formation submucosal concavity . The primary outcome study apico-coronal change peri-implant mucosal zenith prosthesis delivery one year .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age great Subjects require replacement singlerooted tooth maxillary arch first premolar first premolar implantsupported restoration Teeth adjacent ( mesial distal ) study site must consist two stable , natural teeth without sign periodontal bone loss ( < 2.0mm ) and/or significant soft tissue loss An oppose dentition teeth , implant , fix prosthesis Subjects must willing follow instruction relate study procedure Subjects must read , understood , sign informed consent document Insufficient interocclusal space implant placement and/or restoration study site More 2.0mm vertical bone loss study site measure midbuccal crest bone adjacent teeth Untreated rampant caries Tobacco use free ≤ 6 month Liver kidney disfunction/failure Active severe infectious disease may affect normal heal and/or bone metabolism ( e.g . AIDS ) Uncontrolled diabetes Current alcohol drug abuse Need systemic corticosteroid medication would influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration History relevant head/neck cancer and/or radiation head/neck Subjects currently use bisphosphonates history bisphosphonate use Subjects metabolic bone diseases osteoporosis Paget 's disease bone Known pregnancy nurse mother Unable unwilling return followup visit period 1 year Unlikely able comply study procedure accord investigator judgement
